title: Motion in the plane with exp and trig functions

content.question: At time t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 2π, the position of a particle moving along a path in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations x = et sin t and y = et cos t. (a) Find the slope of the path of the particle at time t = π/2.

frqParts.text: At time t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 2π, the position of a particle moving along a path in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations x = et sin t and y = et cos t. (a) Find the slope of the path of the particle at time t = π/2.
(b) Find the speed of the particle when t = 1.
(c) Find the distance traveled by the particle along the path from t = 0 to t = 1.
